Sentencas: Commercially available Phlogopite mica papers of varying thickness, similar to0.1, similar to0.2, and similar to0.5 mm, were evaluated as potential solid oxide fuel cell (SPFC) seal materials.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness

Sentencas: The micas were tested in two forms: plain and hybrid.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness

Sentencas: The hybrid form involved the addition of glass interlayers between the mica and the adjacent components.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness

Sentencas: For each sample, about 30 thermal cycles were conducted and the 800degreesC leak rates were determined.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness

Sentencas: The results showed an excellent thermal cycle stability of the Phlogopite micas in the hybrid design in that the leak rates remained almost constant after similar to10 cycles.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness

Sentencas: In addition, the leak rate appeared to increase with increasing mica thickness in the hybrid design, but showed no thickness dependence for mica in the plain design.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness

Sentencas: The Phlogopite micas also showed good mid-term (similar to500h) stability in both air and reducing environments.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness

Sentencas: Microstructure characterization showed no distinct degradation such as fragmentation and particle formation after thermal cycle and the mid-term stability tests.
Titulo: Phlogopite mica-based compressive seals for solid oxide fuel cells: effect of mica thickness
